Title: Halter Top Evening Dress with Keyhole

Featured-image: 8706-gray-halter-top-evening-dress-with-keyhole_p.jpg

----

Description: Beautiful 1920s inspired halter top gown. The front of the gown features a plunging cut out and a high collar. The bodice is stripped with horizontal sparkling lines while the skirt features vertical sparkling lines. A sheer back is lined as well and has open shoulders. This gown is ready for a special evening.
